sourcesContent: import React from "react" import PropTypes from "prop-types" import "./style.scss" const Button = ({href, children, background, withBottomMargin, centredSecondary, ...props}) => <> {href ? {children} : } Button.propTypes = { href: PropTypes.string, children: PropTypes.node.isRequired, background: PropTypes.string, withBottomMargin: PropTypes.bool } export default Button
